action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows abstract geometric shapes in various colors. There are L-shaped and T-shaped forms in olive green, a purple cross shape, orange L-shapes, and pink rectangular shapes. These shapes are arranged in a seemingly random pattern against a white background.

The shapes are arranged in a seemingly random pattern across the upper part of the image, with some empty white space at the bottom.
